DamageResistances: Bludgeoning, Slashing, and Piercing from non-magical weapons; Psychic; Necrotic

Traits.Name: Trickster's Misdirection
Traits.Content: The Tikbalang can create illusory trails in its vicinity, causing creatures that attempt to track it to make a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or become disoriented, failing to find its true position.

Traits.Name: Supernatural Resistance
Traits.Content: The Tikbalang has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or confused.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The Tikbalang makes two attacks with Trampling Hooves.

Actions.Name: Trampling Hooves
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (3d8 + 8) bludgeoning damage. The target must succeed on a DC 16 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

Actions.Name: Illusory Strike
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 30 (4d10 + 8) psychic damage and the creature must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or be confused until the end of its next turn.

Actions.Name: Misty Escape
Actions.Content: The Tikbalang can misty step up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see as a bonus action. This movement does not provoke opportunity attacks.
